alert.note: Alert for Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet; South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 2:13PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Larimer and northwestern Boulder Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 213 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Estes Park, or 27 miles southwest of Fort Collins, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Estes Park, Meeker Park, Longs Peak, Raymond and Allenspark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet; South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet
